articles.title: Bajaj Finance an elephant that can dance, say bullish analysts, but investors stay cautious - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Analyst Buy calls on the Bajaj Finance stock stand at 24 currently, compared to 19 a year ago. However, the NBFC's shares are down 2 percent over the last one year, while Nifty has advanced 11 percent.
articles.content:

articles.title: Investors Continue To Flock To Small-Cap Funds In July: AMFI Data - BQ Prime
articles.description: Investors continued to be attracted to small-cap funds, which accounted for 54.7% of the net equity fund inflows.
articles.content: Small-cap funds saw inflows of Rs 4,171.4 crore in July, compared with Rs 5,472 crore in June. Large-cap schemes saw outflows of Rs 1,880 crore last month, compared to outflows of Rs 2,050 crore in J… [+297 chars]

articles.title: In pics: Honda SP160 is here to rival Bajaj Pulsar N160 - HT Auto
articles.description: Honda SP160 shares its engine with the X-Blade. It produces 13.27 bhp at 7,500 rpm and a peak torque output of 14.58 Nm at 5,500 rpm. The gearbox on duty is a 5-speed unit.
